txt.en: There are many different Skirmish rewards available. All of them require Skirmish Marks, earned from accomplishing goals within Skirmishes. At various Skirmish Camps around the world, you will find characters willing to barter you those rewards for the Skirmish Marks you have earned.

There are many different Skirmish rewards available. All of them require Marks, earned from accomplishing goals within Skirmishes. At various Skirmish Camps around the world, you will find characters willing to barter you those rewards for the Marks you have earned.
